trans-unit.source: As of 3.4
As of 5.3.0 the preferred way to do this is with make_subsize(). It creates the new images one at a time and allows for the meta data to be saved after each new image is created.

As of 2.0.1, the referer is checked only if the $action argument is not specified (or set to the default -1) as a backward compatibility fallback for not using a nonce. A nonce is prefered to unreliable referers and with $action specified the function behaves the same way as wp_verify_nonce() except that it dies after calling wp_nonce_ays() if the nonce is not valid or was not sent.

As of PHP 5.4, the array is no longer passed by reference despite the function’s name. You cannot even use the reference sign ‘&’ because call time pass by reference now throws an error. What you can do is pass the reference pointer as an array element. Doing so does require all callbacks added to the action to expect a reference pointer.

As of PHP 5.4, the array is no longer passed by reference despite the function’s name. You cannot even use the reference sign ‘&’ because call time pass by reference now throws an error. What you can do is pass the reference pointer as an array element. Doing so does require all callbacks added to the filter to expect a reference pointer. This is not something you will see in WordPress actions. This technique is provided for informational purposes only.
As of WordPress 3.5.0, XML-RPC is enabled by default. It can be disabled via the ‘xmlrpc_enabled’ filter found in wp_xmlrpc_server::login().

trans-unit.source: Be aware of the queries you are changing when using the pre_get_posts action. Make use of conditional tags to target the right query. For example, its recommended to use the the is_admin() conditional to not change queries in the admin screens. With the $query->is_main_query() conditional from the query object you can target the main query of a page request. The main query is used by the primary post loop that displays the main content for a post, page or archive. Without these conditionals you could unintentionally be changing the query for custom loops in sidebars, footers, or elsewhere.
trans-unit.target: 请注意使用 pre_get_posts 操作时要更改的查询。利用条件标签来定位正确的查询。例如，建议使用is_admin（）条件，不要在管理屏幕中更改查询。使用查询对象中的 $query->is_main_query() 条件，您可以定位页面请求的主查询。主要查询由主要帖子循环使用，该循环显示帖子，页面或档案的主要内容。没有这些条件，您可能会无意中更改侧边栏，页脚或其他地方的自定义循环查询。

trans-unit.source: Be careful in using this function correctly. It will only escape values to be used in strings in the query. That is, it only provides escaping for values that will be within quotes in the SQL (as in field = '{$escaped_value}'). If your value is not going to be within quotes, your code will still be vulnerable to SQL injection. For example, this is vulnerable, because the escaped value is not surrounded by quotes in the SQL query: ORDER BY {$escaped_value}. As such, this function does not escape unquoted numeric values, field names, or SQL keywords.
Be careful not to confuse the two query conditionals:
trans-unit.target: 要注意不要把这两个查询条件混淆。

trans-unit.source: Bump up the request timeout for http requests
trans-unit.target: 增加http请求的超时时间。

trans-unit.source: By adding one more level of \ escaping using function wp_slash (introduced in WP 3.6), you can compensate for the call to stripslashes()

By contrast, when changeset branching is allowed, then the model is like users going to "add new" for a page and each user makes changes independently of each other since they are all operating on their own separate pages, each getting their own separate initial auto-drafts and then once initially saved, autosave revisions on top of that user’s specific post.
trans-unit.target: 相比之下，当允许变更集分支时，该模型就像用户要为页面“添加新内容”，并且每个用户都独立于彼此进行更改，因为他们都在各自独立的页面上操作，每个人都拥有各自独立的初始名称自动起草，然后最初保存后，将修订自动保存在该用户的特定帖子之上。

trans-unit.source: By default (if this filter does not return an array), a query will be run to determine the months that have media items. This query can be expensive for large media libraries, so it may be desirable for sites to override this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下(如果该过滤器不返回数组),将运行一个查询来确定有媒体项目的月份。对于大型媒体库来说,这种查询可能会很昂贵,所以网站最好是覆盖这种行为。

trans-unit.source: By default a revision is saved only if one of the revisioned fields has changed. This filter allows for additional checks to determine if there were changes.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,只有当一个修改过的字段发生变化时,才会保存修改。这个过滤器允许额外的检查来确定是否有修改。

trans-unit.source: By default a revision is saved only if one of the revisioned fields has changed. This filter can override that so a revision is saved even if nothing has changed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,只有当一个修改过的字段发生变化时,才会保存修改。这个过滤器可以覆盖这一点,所以即使没有任何变化,也会保存一个修订版。

trans-unit.source: By default a subset of the_content filters are applied, including wpautop and wptexturize.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,应用的是the_content过滤器的子集,包括wpautop和wptexturize。

trans-unit.source: By default database errors are not shown.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,数据库错误不显示。

trans-unit.source: By default database errors are suppressed, with a simple call to this function they can be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 在默认情况下,数据库错误是被抑制的,通过简单的调用这个函数,它们可以被启用。

trans-unit.source: By default database errors are suppressed.
By default editing of network is restricted to the Network Admin for that $network_id. This function allows for this to be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，仅限于 $network_id 的网络管理员来编辑网络。此功能允许它被覆盖。

trans-unit.source: By default in core, when changeset branching is not allowed, changesets will operate linearly in that only one saved changeset will exist at a time (with a ‘draft’ or ‘future’ status). This makes the Customizer operate in a way that is similar to going to "edit" to one existing post: all users will be making changes to the same post, and autosave revisions will be made for that post.
trans-unit.target: 在内核中，默认情况下，不允许更改集分支时，更改集将线性运行，因为一次仅存在一个保存的更改集（处于“草稿”或“未来”状态）。这使Customizer的操作类似于“编辑”一个现有帖子的方式：所有用户都将对同一帖子进行更改，并将对该帖子进行自动保存修订。

trans-unit.source: By default it supports the ‘src’ and ‘href’ attributes. However this can be changed via the 3rd param.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，它支持'src'和'href'属性。但是，这可以通过第三参数进行更改。

trans-unit.source: By default messages will show immediately after the submission that generated the error. Additional calls to settings_errors() can be used to show errors even when the settings page is first accessed.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，将在提交生成错误后立即显示消息。即使首次访问设置页面，也可以使用对settings_errors（）的其他调用来显示错误。

trans-unit.source: By default the path will go through the ‘get_attached_file’ filter, but passing a true to the $unfiltered argument of get_attached_file() will return the file path unfiltered.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，路径将通过“ get_attached_file”过滤器，但是将true传递给get_attached_file（）的$ unfiltered参数将返回未过滤的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: By default the privacy options form displays a single checkbox to ‘discourage’ search engines from indexing the site. Hooking to this action serves a dual purpose:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，隐私选项表单显示一个复选框，以“阻止”搜索引擎将网站编入索引。挂钩此动作有双重目的：

trans-unit.source: By default this column is hidden unless something is hooked to the action.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,这一列是隐藏的,除非有东西与动作挂钩。

trans-unit.source: By default this displays the default sidebar or ‘sidebar-1’. If your theme specifies the ‘id’ or ‘name’ parameter for its registered sidebars you can pass an ID or name as the $index parameter. Otherwise, you can pass in a numerical index to display the sidebar at that index.

By default this displays the default sidebar or ‘sidebar-1’. If your theme specifies the ‘id’ or ‘name’ parameter for its registered sidebars you can pass an id or name as the $index parameter. Otherwise, you can pass in a numerical index to display the sidebar at that index.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，它显示默认的侧边栏或“ sidebar-1”。如果您的主题为其注册的侧边栏指定了“ id”或“ name”参数，则可以传递一个id或name作为$ index参数。否则，您可以传入数字索引以在该索引处显示侧边栏。

trans-unit.source: By default, wp_list_categories() displays:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，wp_list_categories（）显示：

trans-unit.source: By default, wp meta() is called immediately after wp_loginout() by sidebar.php and the Meta widget, allowing functions to add new list items to the widget.
By default, WordPress bundles many popular scripts commonly used by web developers besides the scripts used by core itself. Below is an (incomplete) list of the handles and paths of these scripts.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,除了核心本身使用的脚本外,WordPress还捆绑了许多网络开发者常用的脚本。以下是这些脚本的句柄和路径的(不完整)列表。

trans-unit.source: By default, WordPress installation includes many popular javascript libraries and scripts commonly used by web developers besides the scripts used by WordPress itself. Some of them are listed in the table below.
By default, WordPress installation includes many popular scripts commonly used by web developers besides the scripts used by WordPress itself. Some of them are listed in the table below.
trans-unit.target: 在默认情况下,WordPress的安装除了WordPress本身使用的脚本外,还包含了许多网络开发者常用的脚本。其中一些脚本如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: By default, WordPress will show password protected posts with a title of "Protected: %s", as the REST API communicates the protected status of a post in a machine readable format, we remove the "Protected: " prefix.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,WordPress会以 "Protected:%s "为标题显示受密码保护的帖子,由于REST API以机器可读的格式来传达帖子的受保护状态,我们去掉 "Protected:"的前缀。

trans-unit.source: By default, WordPress will show password protected posts with a title of "Protected: %s". As the REST API communicates the protected status of a post in a machine readable format, we remove the "Protected: " prefix.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,WordPress会以 "Protected:%s "的标题来显示受密码保护的帖子。由于REST API以机器可读的格式来传达帖子的保护状态,我们删除了 "Protected:"的前缀。

trans-unit.source: By default, administrators are notified when the update offer received from WordPress.org sets a particular flag. This allows some discretion in if and when to notify.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,当收到来自WordPress.org的更新提议时,管理员会收到通知,设置一个特定的标志。这允许在是否和何时通知上有一定的自由裁量权。

trans-unit.source: By default, an empty string. A user object if provided.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,是一个空字符串。如果提供了一个用户对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, an infinite number of revisions are kept.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,会保留无限的修改次数。

trans-unit.source: By default, comment authors aren’t notified of their comments on their own posts. This filter allows you to override that.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，评论作者不会收到关于自己帖子的评论的通知。该过滤器使您可以覆盖它。

trans-unit.source: By default, converts accent characters to ASCII characters and further limits the output to alphanumeric characters, underscore (_) and dash (-) through the ‘sanitize_title’ filter.
By default, eight keys are accepted as part of the capabilities array:
By default, only post authors are notified of comments. This filter allows others to be added.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,只有文章作者才会收到评论通知。此过滤器允许添加其他人。

trans-unit.source: By default, seven keys are accepted as part of the capabilities array:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,七个键被接受为能力阵列的一部分。

trans-unit.source: By default, spaces include new lines, tabs, nbsp entities, and the UTF-8 nbsp. This is designed to replace the PCRE \s sequence. In ticket #22692, that sequence was found to be unreliable due to random inclusion of the A0 byte.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,空格包括新行、制表符、nbsp实体和UTF-8 nbsp.这是为了取代PCRE \s序列而设计的。在票据#22692中,由于随机包含A0字节,该序列被发现是不可靠的。

trans-unit.source: By default, the "Create Audio Playlist" button will always be shown in the media library. If this filter returns null, a query will be run to determine whether the media library contains any audio items. This was the default behavior prior to version 4.8.0, but this query is expensive for large media libraries.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，“创建音频播放列表”按钮将始终显示在媒体库中。如果此过滤器返回 null ，则将运行查询以确定媒体库是否包含任何音频项目。这是版本4.8.0之前的默认行为，但是对于大型媒体库，此查询的成本很高。

trans-unit.source: By default, the "Create Video Playlist" button will always be shown in the media library. If this filter returns null, a query will be run to determine whether the media library contains any video items. This was the default behavior prior to version 4.8.0, but this query is expensive for large media libraries.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，“创建视频播放列表”按钮将始终显示在媒体库中。如果此过滤器返回 null ，则将运行查询以确定媒体库是否包含任何视频项目。这是版本4.8.0之前的默认行为，但是对于大型媒体库，此查询的成本很高。

trans-unit.source: By default, the caption is 10 pixels greater than the width of the image, to prevent post content from running up against a floated image.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,标题比图片宽度大10个像素,以防止帖子内容跑到浮动的图片上。

trans-unit.source: By default, the comment will be moved to the Trash instead of deleted. See wp_delete_comment() for more information on this behavior.
By default, the comment will be moved to the trash instead of deleted. See wp_delete_comment() for more information on this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，评论将移至垃圾箱而不是被删除。有关此行为的更多信息，请参见wp_delete_comment（）。

trans-unit.source: By default, the comments will use the default settings for whether the comments are allowed. You can close them manually or keep them open by setting the value for the ‘comment_status’ key.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，注释将使用默认设置来确定是否允许注释。您可以手动关闭它们，也可以通过设置'comment_status'键的值使其保持打开状态。

trans-unit.source: By default, the lifetime is 3 days. Once the file reaches that age, it will automatically be deleted by a cron job.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,寿命为3天。一旦文件达到这个期限,它将被cron作业自动删除。

trans-unit.source: By default, the object cache is non-persistent. This means that data stored in the cache resides in memory only and only for the duration of the request. Cached data will not be stored persistently across page loads unless you install a persistent caching plugin.

By default, the page title will display the separator before the page title, so that the blog title will be before the page title. This is not good for title display, since the blog title shows up on most tabs and not what is important, which is the page that the user is looking at.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下,页面标题前会显示分隔符,所以博客标题会在页面标题之前。这对标题显示并不好,因为博客标题会显示在大多数标签页上,而不是重要的内容,也就是用户正在看的页面。

trans-unit.source: By default, the schema of settings will throw an error if a value is set to null as it’s not a valid value for something like "type => string". We provide a wrapper sanitizer to allow the use of null.

By default, the schema of settings will throw an error if a value is set to null as it’s not a valid value for something like "type => string". We provide a wrapper sanitizer to whitelist the use of null.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，如果将值设置为 null ，则设置架构将引发错误，因为它对于“ type => string”之类的值不是有效值。我们提供了一个包装消毒器，将 null 的使用列入白名单。

trans-unit.source: By default, these values default to ‘center’ when using hard crop mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用硬裁剪模式时，这些值默认为“居中”。

trans-unit.source: By default, updates all the tables to use the latest defined schema, but can also be used to update a specific set of tables in wp_get_db_schema().
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，更新所有表以使用最新定义的架构，但也可以用于更新wp_get_db_schema（）中的一组特定表。

trans-unit.source: By including the context in the pot file, translators can translate the two strings differently.
trans-unit.target: 通过在锅文件中加入上下文,译者可以对两个字符串进行不同的翻译。

trans-unit.source: CURIEs allow a shortened version of URI relations. This allows a more usable form for custom relations than using the full URI. These work similarly to how XML namespaces work.
trans-unit.target: CURIEs允许URI关系的缩短版。这使得自定义关系的形式比使用完整的URI更可用。这些工作类似于XML命名空间的工作方式。

trans-unit.source: Cache entries are keyed by the theme and the type of data.
trans-unit.target: 缓存条目按主题和数据类型进行键入。

trans-unit.target: 按主题和数据类型键入的缓存条目。

trans-unit.source: Care should be taken to protect the email address and assure that email harvesters do not capture your commenter’s email address. Most assume that their email address will not appear in raw form on the site. Doing so will enable anyone, including those that people don’t want to get the email address and use it for their own means good and bad.
trans-unit.target: 应注意保护电子邮件地址，并确保电子邮件收集器不会捕获您评论者的电子邮件地址。大多数人假设他们的电子邮件地址不会以原始形式出现在网站上。这样做将使任何人都能使用，包括那些不想获得该电子邮件地址并将其用于自己的电子邮件地址的人有好有坏。

trans-unit.source: Changeset UUID, the post_name for the customize_changeset post containing the customized state. Defaults to null resulting in a UUID to be immediately generated. If false is provided, then then the changeset UUID will be determined during after_setup_theme: when the customize_changeset_branching filter returns false, then the default UUID will be that of the most recent customize_changeset post that has a status other than 'auto-draft', 'publish', or 'trash'. Otherwise, if changeset branching is enabled, then a random UUID will be used.
trans-unit.target: post_name UUID，即custom_changeset帖子的post_name，其中包含定制状态。默认为 null ,导致立即生成UUID。如果 false 提供，然后再变更UUID会期间确定 after_setup_theme ：当 customize_changeset_branching 过滤器返回false，那么默认的UUID将是最近的 customize_changeset 具有比“自动草案”之外的状态后，“发布”或“垃圾箱”。否则，如果启用了变更集分支，则将使用随机UUID。

trans-unit.source: Checks compatibility with the current PHP version.
trans-unit.target: 检查与当前PHP版本的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Checks compatibility with the current WordPress version.
trans-unit.target: 检查与当前WordPress版本的兼容性。

trans-unit.source: Checks for "Site Wide Only: true" for backward compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 检查 "仅限网站范围:true "是否向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: Checks for “Network: true” in the plugin header to see if this should be activated only as a network wide plugin. The plugin would also work when Multisite is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 检查插件标题中的“ Network：true”以查看是否仅应将其作为网络范围的插件激活。未启用多站点时，该插件也将起作用。

trans-unit.source: Checks for SSL
trans-unit.target: 检查SSL

trans-unit.source: Checks for Subversion, Git, Mercurial, and Bazaar. It recursively looks up the filesystem to the top of the drive, erring on the side of detecting a VCS checkout somewhere.
trans-unit.target: 检查Subversion、Git、Mercurial和Bazaar。它递归地查找文件系统到驱动器的顶部,错误地在某处检测VCS检查。

trans-unit.source: Checks for a file in the WordPress root directory named ".maintenance". This file will contain the variable $upgrading, set to the time the file was created. If the file was created less than 10 minutes ago, WordPress enters maintenance mode and displays a message.
trans-unit.target: 检查WordPress根目录下一个名为".maintaining "的文件。这个文件将包含变量$upgrading,设置为文件的创建时间。如果该文件创建时间少于10分钟,WordPress将进入维护模式并显示一条信息。

trans-unit.source: Checks for a valid value for the reassign parameter when deleting users.
trans-unit.target: 删除用户时,确认重新分配参数的有效值。

trans-unit.source: Checks for available updates to plugins based on the latest versions hosted on WordPress.org.
Checks for available updates to themes based on the latest versions hosted on WordPress.org.
Checks for errors when using cookie-based authentication.
trans-unit.target: 当使用基于cookie的认证时,检查是否有错误。

trans-unit.source: Checks for imbalanced braces, brackets, and comments. Notifications are rendered when the customizer state is saved.
trans-unit.target: 检查不平衡的大括号、括号和注释。保存自定义器状态时,会呈现通知。

trans-unit.source: Checks for invalid UTF-8,
trans-unit.target: 检查是否有无效的UTF-8。

trans-unit.source: Checks for invalid UTF8 in a string.
trans-unit.target: 检查字符串中是否有无效的UTF8。

trans-unit.target: 检查'siteurl'选项是否安装了WordPress。

trans-unit.target: 检查博客是否被删除,不活动,存档,或垃圾邮件。

Checks if the current post is within any of the given categories.
trans-unit.target: 检查当前职位是否属于任何给定类别。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the current theme is active.
trans-unit.target: 检查当前主题是否处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the current user belong to a given site.
trans-unit.target: 检查当前用户是否属于某个网站。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the current user has permissions to import new users.
trans-unit.target: 确认当前用户是否有导入新用户的权限。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the current user-settings cookie is updated and stores it. When no cookie exists (different browser used), adds the last saved cookie restoring the settings.
trans-unit.target: 检查当前的用户设置cookie是否更新,并进行存储。当没有cookie存在时(使用不同的浏览器),添加最后保存的cookie恢复设置。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the given IP is a valid IPv6 address
trans-unit.target: 检查给定的IP是否为有效的IPv6地址。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the given plugin can be viewed by the current user.
Checks if the method received at least the minimum number of arguments.
trans-unit.target: 检查该方法是否至少收到了最少的参数数。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the post can be read.
trans-unit.target: 检查帖子是否可以阅读。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the query is accessing a collation considered safe on the current version of MySQL.
Checks if the response is an error, i.e. >= 400 response code.
trans-unit.target: 检查响应是否为错误，即> = 400响应代码。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the user can access password-protected content.
trans-unit.target: 检查用户是否可以访问受密码保护的内容。

trans-unit.target: 检查用户是否可以访问可视编辑器，以及用户浏览器是否支持它。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the user can refresh this partial.
trans-unit.target: 检查用户是否可以刷新这个局部。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the user needs a browser update.

trans-unit.target: 检查用户是否需要更新PHP。

trans-unit.source: Checks if the user provided value is equivalent to a stored value for the given meta key.
Checks required user capabilities and whether the theme has the feature support required by the panel.
trans-unit.target: 检查所需的用户功能和主题是否有面板所需的功能支持。

trans-unit.target: 检查所需的用户功能,以及主题是否有该部分所需的功能支持。

trans-unit.source: Checks that current theme files ‘index.php’ and ‘style.css’ exists.
trans-unit.target: 检查当前主题文件“ index.php”和“ style.css”是否存在。

trans-unit.source: Checks that database table column matches the criteria.
Checks that the “plugin” parameter is a valid path.
Checks that the connection to the database is still up. If not, try to reconnect.
trans-unit.target: 检查与数据库的连接是否还在。如果没有,请尝试重新连接。

trans-unit.source: Checks that the current theme has ‘index.php’ and ‘style.css’ files.
Checks that the given token is present and hasn’t expired.
trans-unit.target: 检查给定令牌是否存在并且尚未过期。

trans-unit.source: Checks that the main plugin file exists and is a valid plugin. See validate_file().
trans-unit.target: 检查主插件文件是否存在并且是有效插件。参见validate_file（）。

trans-unit.source: Checks that the taxonomy is valid.
trans-unit.target: 检查分类法是否有效。

trans-unit.source: Checks that the taxonomy name exists.
trans-unit.target: 检查分类名是否存在。

trans-unit.source: Checks the $wp_settings_errors array for any errors declared during the current pageload and returns them.
trans-unit.target: 检查$wp_settings_errors数组在当前页面加载过程中声明的任何错误并返回它们。

trans-unit.source: Checks the ‘upload_path’ option, which should be from the web root folder, and if it isn’t empty it will be used. If it is empty, then the path will be ‘WP_CONTENT_DIR/uploads’. If the ‘UPLOADS’ constant is defined, then it will override the ‘upload_path’ option and ‘WP_CONTENT_DIR/uploads’ path.
trans-unit.target: 检查“ upload_path”选项，该选项应来自Web根文件夹，如果不为空，则将使用该选项。如果为空，则路径为“ WP_CONTENT_DIR / uploads”。如果定义了“ UPLOADS”常量，则它将覆盖“ upload_path”选项和“ WP_CONTENT_DIR / uploads”路径。

trans-unit.source: Checks the HTML for the rel="pingback" link and x-pingback headers. It does a check for the x-pingback headers first and returns that, if available. The check for the rel="pingback" has more overhead than just the header.
trans-unit.target: 检查HTML中的rel="pingback "链接和x-pingback头信息。它首先检查x-pingback头信息,如果有的话就返回。对rel="pingback "的检查比只检查头文件有更多的开销。

trans-unit.source: Checks the age against $this->reference_time to determine if the cookie is expired.
trans-unit.target: 根据$ this-> reference_time检查使用期限，以确定cookie是否过期。
